home_page.description: QX is a decentralized exchange running as a smart contract on the Qubic network.
home_page.entity_search_desc: Show trades and open orders of an entity.

error_page.error_404_message: Congratulations! You are one of the elite who managed to find our 404 page.
error_page.title: Oops!
error_page.unexpected_error: Sorry, an unexpected error has occurred.

trades_table.error_fetching_trades: Something went wrong while fetching the latest trades. Please try again later.

orders_table.error_fetching_open_orders: Something went wrong while fetching the open orders. Please try again later.

issued_assets_table.error_fetching_issued_assets: Something went wrong while fetching the latest issued assets. Please try again later.

transfers_table.error_fetching_transfers: Something went wrong while fetching the latest transfers. Please try again later.

connect_wallet_modal.scan_qr: Scan this QR code with your Qubic Wallet or copy the link below:
connect_wallet_modal.wallet_connection_gen_url_error: Failed to generate WalletConnect URI. Please try again.
connect_wallet_modal.wallet_connection_expired: Your connection request has expired. Please generate a new QR code to try again.

errors.error_fetching_data: Something went wrong while fetching the data. Please try again later.
errors.unexpected_error: An unexpected error has occurred. Please try again later.

trade_modal.success_state_desc: Your order transaction has been successfully submitted. You can track its status in your wallet to ensure it has been placed correctly. The order will be processed based on the availability of matching bids or asks. Feel free to monitor its progress or check back later for updates.
trade_modal.error_state_desc: The transaction was unsuccessful, but your funds remain safe in your wallet. Feel free to attempt the transaction again. If the problem continues, please reach out to support for assistance.

errors.not_enough_qubic: Not enough QUBIC in your wallet to place this order.
errors.not_enough_asset: Not enough {{asset}} in your wallet to place this order.

remove_order_modal.remove_order_desc: Are you sure you want to remove your <side>{{side}}</side> order for <amount>{{amount}}</amount> <asset>{{asset}}</asset> at <price>{{price}}</price> QUBIC each, totaling <total>{{total}}</total> QUBIC?
remove_order_modal.remove_order_success: Transaction sent successfully, Order will be removed at tick <tick>{{tick}}</tick>
remove_order_modal.error_removing_order: Error while sending transaction to remove order

rpc_errors.user_unavailable: You're currently busy with another request. Please complete or cancel it before trying again.
rpc_errors.tick_expired: This transaction took too long and tick has expired. Please try again.
rpc_errors.invalid_arguments: Something's off with the request. Double-check your inputs and try again.
rpc_errors.internal_error: Oops! Something went wrong on our end. Please try again in a moment.
